name: FlashCards
0:
”Alexa, open flash cards.”
”I want to practice Addition.”
”I want to practice Multiplication.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flash cards
des: Practice your math flash cards with Alexa. She will ask you math questions just like the flash cards your parents used. To get started say "Alexa, let's practice addition".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
